name: Tea with Manners
description:
TEA WITH MANNERS

You are attending an afternoon tea party with four friends. The host is running around getting ready to serve TEA & SWEETS for all to enjoy.

Unfortunately, not everything is ready to be served. So with each round, the host will serve 4 items to the table.

All BLACK cards are TEA.

All RED cards are SWEETS.

You are asked to help yourself, by taking one item from the center of the table.

But please remember to be polite: DO NOT TAKE TOO MANY SWEETS.

Once the last item has been taken, the party is over. And like every party, the host will judge everyone and their etiquette.

Anyone caught with MORE SWEETS THAN TEA  will become a social outcast. They may not participate in any after-party awards the host may have planned.

The host will reward whoever has better balanced their meal with wonderful  compliments. Your friends will undoubtedly compliment you as well.
